title: Revelation (Peter Andre album)
text:
Revelation is the sixth studio album released by <a href="Australian">Australian</a> singer-songwriter <a href="Peter%20Andre">Peter Andre</a>.
Background.
Following a further three years away from the music industry, Andre had been quietly writing and recording new material. Andre was offered a recording contract with Conehead Management following the success of his <a href="ITV2">ITV2</a> fly-on-the-wall documentary, . Andre began recording with Conehead in January 2009. On 9 August 2009, "<a href="Behind%20Closed%20Doors%20%28Peter%20Andre%20song%29">Behind Closed Doors</a>" was revealed as the first single from Andre's upcoming album. The track was co-written by Andre, AC Burrell and Francesca Richard. "Unconditional" was revealed as the second and final single from the album, due for release on 9 November 2009. However, the track had already charted on the <a href="UK%20Singles%20Chart">UK Singles Chart</a>, following promotion and download sales. Upon the physical release, the track peaked at #50, Andre's second lowest charting single to date. The video for the track premiered on The Box on 16 October 2009. The album itself was released on 19 September 2009, peaking at #3 on the <a href="UK%20Albums%20Chart">UK Albums Chart</a>, and selling more than 300,000 copies to be certified platinum. The album's track listing was confirmed via <a href="Play.com">Play.com</a> on 14 August 2009.
